[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Beam® beamsplitters allow most Microscopes and Ophthalmic Slit Lamps to connect accessories such as video cameras, SLR cameras, and observation tubes. We manufacture a wide range of beamsplitters compatible with most brands. The exit ports are compatible with all TTI Medical adapters and Zeiss style accessories.

  • Available in dual port and single port
  • Single port available in side or vertical mount
  • Zeiss exit ports compatible with all of our products
  • Available with 50/50, 30/70, and 70/30 prisms
  • Compatible with most slit lamps and microscopes

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72843,72844,72845,72846,72841,72842,72211,72858″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574811618696{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Beamsplitters

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]A key component for any camera system, beamsplitters divert light to an exit port where an adapter or observation tube can be attached. A wide range of compatibility and competitive pricing make our beamsplitters an excellent alternative to purchasing direct from the slit lamp or microscope manufacturer.

If you already own a beamsplitter we can work with it to connect our products. Our Beamsplitter Adapters convert an existing beamsplitter port to be Zeiss compatible, which all of our products can use.

Various part numbers[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54c3b8-d1546412-24aa”][vc_column_text]Compatible with Zeiss, Alcon, Leica/WILD, Moller-Wedel/Haag Streit, Topcon, Vasconcellos, Marco, Reichert, Shin Nippon, Takagi, Nidek, CSO, Appasamy, Burton, Woodlyn, KAPS, Seiler, Global and other manufacturers.

Haag-Streit disclaimer[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc3b8-d1546412-24aa”][vc_column_text]Beamsplitters are a class 1 device, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ac3b8-d1546412-24aa”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
